<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is the bottom-up list scheduler used by the vectorizer. It is used for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// checking the legality of vectorization and for scheduling instructions in</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// such a way that makes vectorization possible, if legal.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The legality check is performed by &#96;trySchedule(Instrs)&#96;, which will try to</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// schedule the IR until all instructions in &#96;Instrs&#96; can be scheduled together</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// back-to-back. If this fails then it is illegal to vectorize &#96;Instrs&#96;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Internally the scheduler uses the vectorizer-specific DependencyGraph class.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Control/Other dependencies are not modeled by the DAG to save memory.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// These have to be modeled in the ready list for correctness.</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// unmodeled dependencies.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The list scheduler.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">Scheduler &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is a list-scheduler and this is the list containing the instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// that are ready, meaning that all their dependency successors have already</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// been scheduled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/readylistcontainer">ReadyListContainer</a> ReadyList;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The dependency graph is used by the scheduler to determine the legal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// ordering of instructions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/dependencygraph">DependencyGraph</a> DAG;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// This is the top of the schedule, i.e. the location where the scheduler</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// is about to place the scheduled instructions. It gets updated as we</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// schedule.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::optional&lt;BasicBlock::iterator&gt; ScheduleTopItOpt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: This is wasting memory in exchange for fast removal using a raw ptr.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;SchedBundle &#42;, std::unique&#95;ptr&lt;SchedBundle&gt;</a>&gt; Bndls;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The BB that we are currently scheduling.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/sandboxir/#a60f87746e4945fda7ea3d5a983c9b62c">BasicBlock</a> &#42;ScheduledBB = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns a scheduling bundle containing \\p Instrs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/schedbundle">SchedBundle</a> &#42;createBundle(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> eraseBundle(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/schedbundle">SchedBundle</a> &#42;SB);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Schedule nodes until we can schedule \\p Instrs back-to-back.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> tryScheduleUntil(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Schedules all nodes in \\p Bndl, marks them as scheduled, updates the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// UnscheduledSuccs counter of all dependency predecessors, and adds any of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// them that become ready to the ready list.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> scheduleAndUpdateReadyList(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/schedbundle">SchedBundle</a> &amp;Bndl);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The scheduling state of the instructions in the bundle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">enum class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> BndlSchedState &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal">    NoneScheduled, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&gt; No instruction in the bundle was previously scheduled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><Highlight kind="normal">    PartiallyOrDifferentlyScheduled, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&gt; Only some of the instrs in the bundle</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="comment">                                     /// were previously scheduled, or all of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="comment">                                     /// them were but not in the same</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><Highlight kind="comment">                                     /// SchedBundle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">    FullyScheduled, </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">///&gt; All instrs in the bundle were previously scheduled and</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="comment">                    /// were in the same SchedBundle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns whether none/some/all of \\p Instrs have been scheduled.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  BndlSchedState getBndlSchedState(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs) </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Destroy the top-most part of the schedule that includes \\p Instrs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Disable copies.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#afc7ba921cb118ef7f7a8b0fac4188350"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#afc7ba921cb118ef7f7a8b0fac4188350">Scheduler</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/aaresults">AAResults</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/context">Context</a> &amp;Ctx) : DAG(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/aa">AA</a>, Ctx) &#123;&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#ae5196b707393b2021e397b3ccc989151"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#ae5196b707393b2021e397b3ccc989151">~Scheduler</a>() &#123;&#125;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Tries to build a schedule that includes all of \\p Instrs scheduled at the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// same scheduling cycle. This essentially checks that there are no</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// dependencies among \\p Instrs. This function may involve scheduling</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// intermediate instructions or canceling and re-scheduling if needed.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\Returns true on success, false otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#a9c67d906d22a6018e3ff649bafed6a1a">trySchedule</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;Instruction &#42;&gt;</a> Instrs);</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Clear the scheduler&#39;s state, including the DAG.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#abf8f36441eb2768093b280ec47ab22fc"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sandboxir/scheduler/#abf8f36441eb2768093b280ec47ab22fc">clear</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">    Bndls.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// TODO: clear view once it lands.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">    DAG.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">    ReadyList.clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScheduleTopItOpt = std::nullopt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">    ScheduledBB = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Bndls.empty() &amp;&amp; DAG.empty() &amp;&amp; ReadyList.empty() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">           !ScheduleTopItOpt &amp;&amp; ScheduledBB == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal">           </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Expected empty state!&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
